column4: I just installed Conky though Synaptic. anyone know where it went?
no problem. If you follow the wiki, it's pretty simple
don't try to write to it.....write's not supported AFAIK
thanks. ill give it a shot
i reinstalled FF and it went. but im gonna give epiphany a try
I switched to epiphany a while back and haven't been to ff since
FF has some nice plugins though
no doubt, but I live without them. ;)
if you can deal with a slim, fast browser with tabs, then try epiphany.
it's functionality is a lot more basic, but I think that was the intention - to keep it lean and quick
